casebody.data:
Levy, Respondent, v. Knickerbocker Ice Co., Appellant. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. March 2, 1891.) Appeal from special term. Action by Abraham Levy, as administrator, etc., against the Knickerbocker Ice Company. From a j udgment in plaintiff’s favor, and from an order denying its motion for a new trial on the minutes, defendant appeals.

Argued before Sedgwick and Dugro, JJ.

Miehal M. Forrest, for appellant. .Alfred Steakler, for respondent. Per Curiam.

Judgment and order affirmed, with costs.
